pages.text: $(li)The Armorer is a skilled blacksmith.$(br)$(li)It will trade you Armors, $(l:patchouli:weapons/shield)Shields$(/l) and even a $(l:patchouli:decoration/vanilla/bell)Bell$(/l) for $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/emerald)Emeralds$(/l).$(br)$(li)A Villager can obtain the Armorer profession if is near a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/blast_furnace)Blast Furnace$(/l).
